description:
Anywhere, anytime, anyone in the world can create drones’ safe paths by provided path producing API. Also full automatic control AI system and multi-encryption blockchain protocol will helps drones to reach their destination safely. PATHHIVE NETWORK, drones integrated-control open platform, will be a guideline of the autonomous era.

Token use: The PAHTHIVE NETWORK Path Producing Open Platform is a web-based tool that allows Path Producers subscribed to the PATHHIVE network to become building and terrain producers to create dron paths in desired locations. Users can create a new path and building by selecting a map. The map displays GPS coordinates, country information, no-fly zone information, altitude restriction information, station information, etc. to guide accurate path production. In addition, the map will also show already existing paths to prevent path collisions.
name: PATHHIVE
